data.title: Katy Perry Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Katy Perry on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Katy Perry including The Smurfs 2, The Smurfs, and more.
data.text:
The Overnight

Officers Chen and Bradford respond to a call at the Los Angeles auditions of "American Idol" and Officer Chen ends up facing Ryan Seacrest and the judges; Chen befriends a reporter whose motives are not clear.

Oh Honey

When Zoey fixes Ted up on a date with her cousin (guest star Katy Perry), the gang resorts to calling her "Honey" after learning how naive she is. Meanwhile, Ted calls an intervention on himself after having an epiphany about his feelings for Zoey, and Barney gets acquainted with Honey in Ted's place.

Single White Female Role Model

When Sabrina is arrested after attending an Occupy Natesville protest, one of the jail attendants (Katy Perry) commits to making her imprisonment as awful as possible; Virginia helps the mayor avoid a scandal.

The Greatest Hits of It

Get ready for season 2 of Kroll Show with a look back at some of season 1's best sketches, and a sneak peek at what all your favorite characters are up to this season.
